long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your chess playing experience with ChessMate+, the ultimate Chrome extension for chess enthusiasts! Whether youâ€™re playing on chess.com or enjoying a game on a physical chessboard, ChessMate+ brings the best of both worlds to your screen.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration with Physical Chessboards: Play online using your physical chessboard. Hear move announcements and follow the game as it unfolds without missing a step.
Voice Announcements: Stay focused on your gameplay with real-time audio alerts for moves made during the game.
Enhanced Gameplay on Chess.com: Optimized tools to make your online chess experience smoother and more enjoyable.
Coming Soon:

Support for other platforms like Lichess and more!
Advanced Physical Chessboard Features: Move state tracking and recognition for an even more intuitive hybrid playing experience.
ChessMate+ is perfect for players who love the tactile feel of a physical board but want the convenience of online play. Download today and elevate your chess game!
